description:
RENTAL OPEN HOUSE 1-2PM Sunday August  21st
Updated and charming stone Cape Cod in Holly Oak. On a corner lot, this lovely home, is a great mixture of traditional charm and modern updates. Even more updates planned before occupancy including: A/C for upper level, New paint and flooring, recessed LED lighting on dimmers on 2nd level. Professional landscaping and professional cleaning. New basement door. Behind the white picket fence, this property provides an abundance of privacy. Enter through an open front porch into the living room, with natural hardwood floors and trim throughout. A brick wood-burning fireplace with mantle is the rooms focal point, perfect for curling up on chilly winter nights. Beyond is the dining room with abundant natural light and a wood chair rail, offsetting the neutral walls. Adjacent is the kitchen, nicely updated, and spacious enough for a breakfast table by a bay window. With plentiful cabinets, including a pantry, the kitchen is lit by recessed lighting and includes a tiled backsplash and granite counter, a 5-burner Maytag gas range with vented microhood, double ovens, a Kenmore dishwasher, double stainless sink with disposal, and a stainless Maytag French refrigerator. A large ground-level deck, perfect for entertaining, is accessed through a kitchen door. Each of the two main level bedrooms are spacious and bright and include lighted ceiling fans and closet space. A full bath, with tiled floor and a cast iron tub/shower and updated vanity complete the main level. Upstairs is a full-floor bedroom and second full bath, cooled separately with window units.
This versatile space could be used as sleeping quarters or a family room and is being upgraded to include luxury vinyl plank flooring and fresh paint. It provides four deep storage areas, multiple closets, as well as a counter space and the makings of a kitchenette. The bath with tiled floor, has a full shower/tub for your convenience. The full basement houses the washer and dryer, and is equipped with a utility sink, French drain and sump pump. With updated 200 Amp electric, this home has a gas boiler, a Rheem gas hot water heater, a separate central AC unit for the first floor, and a walk-out steps up to the back yard. Conveniently located just off Silverside Road in the Brandywine School District, this quaint home is a perfect space to settle in with your family. There are cameras installed in the property. 1) Pets allowed at landlords' sole discretion with deposit. 2)No smoking 3) no water beds. 4) Tenants are responsible for all utilities including prorated sewer. 5) Tenants must use area rugs to protect hardwood floors. title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* Building on Rittenhouse Square
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi
* 24/7 Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!
Apartment Home Features:
* Oversized floor plan
* Large closets
* Wood floors
* Breakfast bar
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* East-facing windows with a city view
* All utilities included
Interested in this home? Then, your next step is to schedule an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com. You may take a guided tour in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!

title: Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Home, Lounge, Gym, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 13, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* One bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Restored Town House next to Penn, Pet Friendly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.
